meanings.definition: A body of ten magistrates or rulers in ancient Rome.
meanings.sent1: In ancient Rome, the decemvirates were responsible for making important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The decemvirates held significant power in governing the city.
meanings.sent3: The decemvirates in Rome must have had a tough time agreeing on matters with so many leaders.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the decemvirates was crucial for the stability of the government.
meanings.sent5: The decemvirates' authority was unmatched in the ancient Roman society.

meanings.definition: The office or term of office of a decemvir.
meanings.sent1: During the decemvirates, each member had specific duties to fulfill.
meanings.sent2: The decemvirates' term was marked by both challenges and achievements.
meanings.sent3: Imagine the decemvirates having a team-building retreat to improve their collaboration skills.
meanings.sent4: The decemvirates' term of office symbolized a period of transition for the city.
meanings.sent5: The responsibilities of the decemvirates shaped the course of history in Rome.
